neuro insults shylily: Neuro insults Shylily at any point during the stream
neuro threatens shylily: Neuro threatens Shylily at any point during the stream
neuro mentions vedal unprompted: Neuro mentions Vedal, her father and creator, unprompted by the review videos or Shylily
neuro mentions evil unprompted: Neuro mentions Evil, her sister, unprompted by the review videos or Shylily
neuro insults submitter: Neuro insults a submitter in some way
neuro praises submitter: Neuro praises a submitter in some way
neuro poor shames submitter: Neuro poor shames a submitter, calling them out for being broke or poor, and laughing about it
neuro mistakes room occupant: Neuro mistakes the room for someone else's, such as Shylily's, Vedal's, Evil's, her own, or some random person
neuro recognises someone: Neuro recognises someone, such as herself, Evil, Vedal, Shylily, or someone else in the form of a fumo, figure, wallpaper, etc. The image must match the person she recognises for this to count
